entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:28 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:28 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
